locations.title: Community Beach Park
locations.street: 700 E Ocean View AveEasygoing bayfront standby with parking
locations.content: Community Beach Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a very nice beach park with public restrooms and an outdoor shower to rinse off.  However, the woman's bathroom smelled bad and needed to be cleaned.  The beach was very clean and not crowded at all.  Also, lifeguards were present. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I love that I can just walk across the street for a fun beach day. The bathrooms could use a little more maitinence and the shower station could be cleaned up a bit. But over all I choose this beach over any in the area for a nice picnic ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ parking spot fairly clean people are pretty nice and mind their own business bathroom and plenty of peers is also food places all around it as well as a Harris teeter they have a tiny shower outside to help keep the sand out of your car

great alternative for beach lovers of Richmond... clean beach... free parking... clean restrooms... only one shower outside for everyone though... you have to press and hold the button for 5 seconds for the water to come out for 3 seconds ‚Ä¶
Favorite beach spot for a family gathering or for meditation...rarely busy and plenty of space. The shower area for rinsing sand off is also helpful.
Beautiful beach.  Clean,  great place for kids.  Restroom and shower.  It wasn't over crowded and there was lots of beach area to sit and enjoy!!
Stumbled upon it by chance. Free to park, easy beach access. Bathrooms, tables, and even a shower to help remove sand. The day I went you could see dolphins out past the shallow water.
A really nice, clean beach. It's nice to get a break from the waves of the ocean. They have bathrooms, parking, and one outdoor shower.
We live in OV and this is our go to parking spot. Restrooms are right there with an outside shower. Picnic tables and easy access to the beach.
It's the beach, cept the shower to wash sand off IS IN THE SAND but yknow still nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: Been our beach since my childhood, nice because it's less people than oceanfront. On site Parking, bathrooms, shower stations.

‚Ä¶ beach which is weird. It is a great place for a family though because it isn't crowded or give off the 'Spring break' vibe other beaches in the area do. Perfect for a day on the beach with family. There's also a place to shower and change.
Clean park with public restrooms and shower to rinse feet. Beach front was very clean and right before leaving at sunset we saw a mother and baby dolphin playing in the water. A great time!!!
Great beach - easy access to restrooms and shower, grocery store & fast food across the street, 3 lifeguards on duty, shallow and calm waters. ‚Ä¶
It's a great rest stop on the beach to change, shower, and park! The city does a great job  maintaining the grounds to provide a clean, utilitarian area for beach-goers!

Great park for an easy family beach day. Free parking right there, bathrooms, outdoor shower to rinse, and calm shallow water.
Good venue and fire works. Has an outdoor shower and bathrooms.
The beach was nice they have a shower to get the sand off you

showerReviews.reviewText: The Kempsville Rec Center was recently closed for maintenance so the shower heads are new. Great pool and resistance pool to walk as well as the walking track on the second floor. The track is unique because it‚Äôs painted different colors ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ toddlers and teenagers. The second floor has an indoor track and some more machines.  The things that are missing are sauna, jaccuzi and heater in the shower/locker area. It gets really cold there specially if one is coming out of the pool.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ had a rubber duck collection for the kids to borrow and play with as long as they returned it afterward, of course. The shower rooms had hot water and plenty of privacy, and the facilities were well-maintained. We will definitely come back.

It is a great Recreation Center, but when I was done swimming, I came out to take a shower and one of the bathrooms was flooded so I went to the bathroom next to it and before I turned on the shower, I seen particles such as dirt and grass ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I hate to say it, but the hot water is out again. When I finished the workout, I literally froze in the shower. Germ control is very important to merely all of us and having HOT water available would help too. I'm going to shop around on my ‚Ä¶
